semantic_identifier: [GOLD-199]: Add compliance requirements checklist to deployment readiness workflow
title: Add compliance requirements checklist to deployment readiness workflow

sections.text: Implement a lightweight, configurable compliance checklist (security review, DPA, retention constraints) that can be attached to an issue/theme and marked as required for deployment readiness. Expose checklist status in the issue object and downstream engineering link (Jira/Linear) so teams can see blockers early. This reduces late-stage compliance surprises that currently slow deployments.
